items.name: Supergiant Amphipod
items.description: The amphipod is a type of crustacean that is found in the Abyssal Plane. It is a scavenger, feeding on dead animals that fall to the ocean floor.

items.name: Fangtooth Fish
items.description: The fangtooth fish is a deep sea fish.

items.name: Anglerfish
items.description: The anglerfish is a deep sea fish. It gets its name from its method of hunting prey, luring its victims with its luminescent fin.

items.name: Great White Shark
items.description: The great white shark is a large predatory fish that is distributed widely throughout the ocean. It is known for its size and speed.
